mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at FROM menus m JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.store_id = #{storeId} AND m.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.display_order, m.menu_name

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at FROM Menus m JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.store_id = #{storeId} AND m.category_id = #{categoryId} AND m.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.menu_name

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at FROM Menus m LEFT JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE m.menu_id = #{menuId} AND m.is_deleted = 0

SELECT oc.category_id, oc.category_name, oc.is_required, oc.display_order, oc.is_sold_out, oc.is_deleted, oc.deleted_at FROM optioncategories oc JOIN menuoptioncategories moc ON oc.category_id = moc.category_id WHERE moc.menu_id = #{menuId} AND oc.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY oc.display_order, oc.category_name

SELECT item_id, category_id, option_name, additional_price, is_default, display_order, is_deleted, deleted_at FROM optionitems WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY display_order, option_name

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at, COUNT(om.order_menu_id) AS order_count FROM menus m JOIN ordermenu om ON m.menu_id = om.menu_id JOIN orders o ON om.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE o.kiosk_id = #{storeId} AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND o.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at, COUNT(DISTINCT om.order_id) AS order_count FROM ordermenu om JOIN orders o ON om.order_id = o.order_id JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id JOIN menus m ON om.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE o.kiosk_id = #{storeId} AND u.id = #{userId} AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND o.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.category_id, c.category_name, m.is_sold_out, m.image_url, m.description, m.is_deleted, m.deleted_at ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
